dict.string: QUESTION ONE
Does your agency use good wireless security practices?
A
We provide VPN service for mobile users, we turn off file sharing, and we only use public Wi-Fi when absolutely necessary.
B
We don’t always use VPN or check the hotspot before we use free public wireless networks.
C
We don’t have a good handle on wireless security practices and staff needs more security awareness when traveling.
QUESTION TWO
Does your agency have a written security plan and the appropriate security polies in place?
A
We have a written security plan and the appropriate security policies (e.g., password complexity, acceptable use).
B
We have security plan but it’s not documented and we need to improve some of our security policies.
C
We don’t have a written security plan or any documented security policies.
QUESTION THREE
Does your agency keep anti-virus and other software updated constantly?
A
We have a patch management process in place (and in effect) and routinely run basic scans.
B
We update tools sporadically and do not run routine scans.
C
We have tools and systems (including anti- virus programs) that are probably out of date.
QUESTION FOUR
Does your agency audit user accounts and change passwords when someone leaves?
A
We routinely review user accounts to be sure they are valid, necessary, and configured properly with appropriate privileges.
B
We will revoke system privileges and change passwords when an employee is fired.
C
We do not monitor user accounts and have not removed all former employees from the system.
QUESTION FIVE
Does your agency monitor and filter network traffic?
A
We monitor all outbound traffic and have a system in place to alert us to anything unusual.
B
We have a system in place to track outbound traffic but it is not consistently monitored.
C
We do not have a system in place to monitor outbound network traffic.
QUESTION SIX
Does your agency manage removable media?
A
We only use removable media to store or transfer information as a last resort. When we use it, we encrypt the data and we educate staff and limit access.
B
We limit the use of removable media but we don’t always encrypt the data and we don’t don’t always record the access.
C
We don’t limit the use of removable media and we don’t secure the data on the removable media drives.
QUESTION SEVEN
Does your agency require strong passwords?
A
We use an automated system to enforce the use of complex passwords. Staff have access to a Password Manager.
B
We require complex passwords and we use a Password Manager but it’s not enforced or automated.
C
We no not require complex passwords or force staff to change their passwords on a regular interval. We don’t use Password Managers or Multi-Factor authentication.
QUESTION EIGHT
Does your agency apply security practices to it’s mobile devices?
A
We have an MDM, we use Anti-Virus on non iPhone devices, we encrypt devices and we require passwords to unlock.
B
We have some security features in place but they aren’t automated or consistently enforced.
C
We probably have mobile devices that need updates and aren’t secured.
QUESTION NINE
Does your agency have an established security awareness training program and maintain user awareness throughout the year?
A
We provide quarterly awareness training and information to our staff.
B
We provide awareness information or training but not both.
C
We don’t provide any security awareness training.
